description: Centralized mappings configuration for the disassembly decision framework. Contains mappings that were previously hardcoded in module logic.

automation_levels.description: Mapping from automation level codes (from DoE table) to numeric degrees [0-1]

product_mix_types.description: Mapping from product mix codes (from DoE table) to product type keys in attributes_disassembly_paths.json

attribute_structure.description: Mapping from attribute file types to their nested structure keys in JSON files

product_types.description: Configuration for all product types in the system
product_types.reference_note: The reference product is used as the master product for step extraction (assumed to have all possible disassembly steps)
